name: Luisa Lima
bio: Python has been, my on and off go-to language for the past 14 years. With the increasing popularity of its data science and security libraries, I feel that it is more important than ever to help people learn and improve!

name: Zhanibek Adilbekov
bio: Python is one of my favorite languages alongside with C# and Scala. While I have expertise in many programming languages, I really enjoyed learning Python. I want to help people conquer the learning curve and enhance their skills.
